Docs.remarks: Always dispose the object before you release your last reference to the . Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the finalizer.

Docs.returns: Returns the encoded pixel data, or if the raw pixels should be used.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class SkiaSharp.SKData OnEncode(class SkiaSharp.SKPixmap pixmap) cil managed

Docs.summary: Implemented by derived types to encode the specified pixel data.

MemberSignature.Value: protected abstract bool OnUseEncodedData (IntPtr data, IntPtr length);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance bool OnUseEncodedData(native int data, native int length) cil managed

Docs.param: The length of the encoded data buffer.
Docs.summary: Implemented by derived types to determine whether the caller should use the specified encoded data instead of encoding a new version.
Docs.returns: Returns if the specified encoded data should be used, otherwise to serialize another version.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
If this method returns `true`, then <xref:SkiaSharp.SKPixelSerializer.Encode%2A> should not be called to encode the source data.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool UseEncodedData (IntPtr data, ulong length);
.method public hidebysig instance bool UseEncodedData(native int data, unsigned int64 length) cil managed

Docs.param: The length of the encoded data buffer.
Docs.summary: Determines whether the serializer wants to use the specified encoded data instead of encoding a new version.
Docs.returns: Returns if the specified encoded data should be used, otherwise to serialize another version.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
If this method returns `true`, then <xref:SkiaSharp.SKPixelSerializer.Encode%2A> may not be called to encode the source data.
